inn1.comm: Get well forward and defends down the line to Pollock
again line and length, defends to Pollock
just outside off, no real movement and well left to de Villiers with gloves today
leg side ball, angled down the leg, flicks, misses, off the pad past a diving keeper
leg stump again, plays from the crease and worked neatly off the legs towards a wide fine leg
takes his first ball of the match on the front foot, defends gently back to Pollock
Ntini shares the new ball, gets it on length, angled in but left on length
once again, just on the off, angled in but again a good leave
left alone to de Villiers, not the most bounce and taken low by the keeper
gets it on line and gets the forward defence in reply
angled in from wide of the crease, gets forward and helps it past a leg gully to the wide fine leg
defends from line and length into the off side
that one does move and bounce off the pitch, drawn forward, pushes at it, well beaten
well forward, angled bat runs it down to third man
all defensive, gets well forward, and pushes to the off, the pitch does seem to be playing a bit slow, and understandingly with the lack of rain this winter
well forward again and all defensive to the off
Pollock on the line and length of his, gets the forward defensive push down the pitch
left alone outside the off, and that hardly gets to de Villiers, taking on the bounce
gets well forward and gets the edge, but the slowness of the pitch and the soft hands has the ball well short of Pollock at first slip
decides to leave alone outside the off this time
half volley from Ntini gets what it deserves and is stroked down the pitch, excellent timing, races away past mid-off
Ntini goes a bit shorter and again great timing, punches off the back foot  racing it past the cover, nice shot
better length from Ntini and well played just outside the off, getting forward and runs it gently towards the gully
line ball, staying wicket to wicket, draws out the defence
outside off, gets on the drive, right hand drags that to the on side and runs down to fine leg area
Pollock stays straight, slight angle down the leg, thuds into the pad as he tries to flick, half an appeal turned down
another lovely off drive, not forced, just excellent timing, finishes on balance as the ball rockets off the bat
all defensive as he gets forward
that slipped out, wide called outside off, Pollock kicks at the turf
that pitches just on line, gets just enough movement off the seam, gets the edge of the defensive bat, and a very good catch by Smith at 2nd slip, low and to his right
well forward defending
that gets up well from just short of a length, pushes at it, not the best shot, a bit loose that
decides to leave a similar ball outside off, this one also gets up a bit
gets on the back foot, worked off the hips towards the fine leg
Taylor is greated by a ball that bounces, but was very short, Ntini had to bend the back a bit
leaves outside off
Pollock stays on line, and again gets the dforward defence, no chances taken
on line and length and once again brings out the defence
just outside off, left alone
slightly over pitched by Pollock and Masakadza strokes that down the ground, Pollock can not get a hand to it, runs down the ground
First ball for Taylor from Pollock is defended to the off
Ntini looks a bit quicker after the double boundaries the previous over, just short of length, defends from the crease
Short of length, he is bending the back now, played down the pitch from the back foot
All defensive, again standing up in the crease and pushes to the off
gets well forward, firmly pushed to the on side but can not beat the field
angled into the legs from wide of the crease and firmly and confidently defended to the off
fuller ball, not there to drive, but played into the off side
just on length, gets across, slightly plays away from the body to the off
shorter ball, gets back and chops down from the back foot, no timing, runs it to point area
short ball, does not want anything to do with it, leans back and leaves
Pollock into a good line and length, brings out the forward defence
no shot offered as that leaves the pitch moving to the off, good leave from Taylor
fuller ball, angled leg stump, flicks and misses, appeal for the lbw, but that is slanting down the leg
on the back foot, dabs to the off, Ntini getting some lift but from a fairly slow pitch
shortish again, gets up on the toes and drives well from the back foot, wont go all the way as cover hauls it in

Taylor gets forward and pushes to the off, Calls for the run, Ntini follows through and underhands that into the stumps, TV called and shows the batsman inches short. Silly call from Taylor sees a wicket given away
angled into the legs of Taibu making his return for Zimbabwe, gets forward and defends to the off, confident looking shot
line and length, slightly fuller ball is pushed from the front foot to the on side
All defensive as he gets one just short of length, angled into the legs, rolls away to the off
well forward on the off, slower ball, right hand drags that one to mid-on, was in the air for a while, but well short of the fielder
well forward just outside the off, opens the face as he runs that down towards third man
Taibu follows Taylors example and gently runs that to third man as well
Pollock bends the back this time, gets the bouncer in from very short, left alone as that loops away to de Villiers behind the stumps
back on line and length, defends to the off
outside off, touch short, Taylor, no foot movement hangs a tentative bat out at that as it stays a bit low
short angled to the leg side, Taibu misses out on that as he tries to work it to the on side, no timing, rolls away to the on side
better length, gets half forward and defends to the off
does not miss out on the short ball this time and he pulls off the front foot well forward of deep midwicket
short again, pulls again, this time off the back foot, played later, maybe a bit quicker from ntini, gets that down to fine leg
fullish on the legs, neatly played with the full bat down to the fine leg
gets back onto the off side, just short of length, defended to the off
Starts well just on the off, firml;y defended to the off, wants a single, suicide, sent back by Taibu
line and length, defends to the off
fullish and too straight, worked into the on side for an easy single
just on the off, moves away, good leave
outside off, touch short, Taibu looks to leave, drops the hands, ball does not get up, catchs the open face and steered down to and wide of third man
outside off, this he does leave, and again low bounce to the keeper
Starts short on the off, cuts well to Bodi at cover, misfield, Bosman quick to recover, Taylor yes no yes wait nearly causes another run out
left alone
Touch short again, cuts firmly, this time Bodi gathers cleanly
outside off, getting slight away movement, slashes at that, high but short of third man
short outside off, cuts firmly, slowness of pitch has him dragging that to Bodi at cover
better length, defends to the off
good length from Morkel has Taylor pushing defensively towards mid-on
slightly short and width, cuts firmly forward of the third man who races across and gathers cleanly
just outside off, good length and is worked from the front foot down towards the third man
full on the legs, clipped neatly wide of the mid-on who has to chase hard
just outside off, touch short, gets across and behind it as he pushes that into the gap wide of mid-on
finds the line and length on this ball with Taylor defending back down the pitch
better line and length from the bowler, defended to the off
too full into the legs and well clipped wide of mid-on who has no chance of stopping that
down the leg side
length ball on the legs is easily pushed to the on side for a good early call and easy run
too full, too straight, too good as that is whipped past midwicket
too full, too straight, stroked down the ground inside mid-on, slows up just short of the boundary, van der Wath struggling to find a groove
slower ball, on line and length, just on the off, rewarded with a defensive dot ball
Drinks helped Morkel as he fires one moving away outside off past the outside edge
touch straight and full, clipped square but cut off by square leg
defends from line and length to the off
gets it on line and length and a solid defensive shot rolls away to the off side
worked off the legs to backward square leg where a diving stop from Tshabalala saves the run
line and length is defended to the off
just on the off, gets forward and stroked through the line towards mid-off
short and wide outside off, slaps the cut from the front foot straight at Duminy at backward point
short again, straighter, too close to get the effective cut, can not beat Duminy
full, on the legs, loves it there, clipped away past midwicket
full on the off, drives well, Bosman at cover cuts off with the outstretched arm as he runs across
slaps a cut off the front foot and again can not beat the off side field
Morkel hitting his lengths now, brings out the defence from taylor
And as we say that, Morkel lets one go down the off side and that is fairly called wide
attempted yorker is well dug out to the off
Morkel back into his area, brings out the defence from the front foot
falls away on this and that is called wide again with Taylor missing out on the drive with a big swing of the bat
full and straight, dabs to the on side for an easy run
all defensive on the front foot, half an appeal for a pad bat , not given
draws Taibu forward just on the off, angled in, has to play, movement takes the ball away, takes the edge for de Villiers, keeping today, to take a simple catch
Gets well forward to defend
well forward, defends to the off
good start from Philander, finding his spot early, draws out another defence
hits the spot again and Taylor can only reply with a forward defence
again is rewarded with a forward defence
touch too straight, worked off the legs towards fine leg
Taylor having no option but to defend to the off
good line and length, defends to the off
maintains his line and length, giving Taylor no room to attack
Taylor loses out on a short wide ball that he cuts straight at Duminy at backward point
back on length, back to the defensive prod
too straight this time and Tayloir whips that away to the on side off his toes
just outside off, angled across the left hander, defends to the off
stays over the wicket to the left hander who is forward defending towards the backward point
Williams lets that go outside off

WHAT A CATCH, Williams gets one sliding across him, goes on the drive, gets the edge, the old man Pollock takes off to his left, dives full length to snatch a one handed left hand catch out of the air
Matsikenyeri is drawn well forward on the front foot, a touch outside off, the off cutter bites, slips through between bat and pad and sends the off stump flying
Chigumbura avoids disaster by defending the straight ball back down the pitch to Philander
fullish on the off is stroked down the ground towards mid-on
just on the off, looks to run it to third man from the front foot, can not beat the gully
touch too wide outside off, good leave from taylor as that moves away off the pitch as well
line and length, defends to the off, can not find the gap
fullish ball is flicked off the toes towards and wide of Bodi at fine leg, Taylor attempts to beat the return but TV finds him well short of a good return from Bodi to the keeper
just on the off, defends to the off
outside off, leaves him off the pitch, left alone
line and length, defends to the off
on the button again, can only defends down the on side of the pitch
onve again, gets that on the spot, draws out the defensive shot to the off

Chigumbura defends to the off, ball squirts wide of Duminy at backward point, fumbles, batsman is ball watching, Utseya comes for the run, sent back, slips, and Ntini has to gather as the throw is wide, lobs to Bosman to remove the bails
defends to the off
outside off, touch too wide, left alone
once again too wide. left alone
straighter ball, gets forward and defends to the off
leaves one going away down the off
fuller ball, sliding down leg, off the pads, no appeal
thats a bit too wide, Brent leaves and gets the wide for his effort
well forward on the off, strokes the drive to cover
fullish on the elg stump, defended to the leg side
on length, just outside off, gets across and forward, defends
looks to run that from outside off to thrid man, but a wide gully cuts that off
this time he does get it to third man, played slightly later and well under the eyes
shorter ball, tries to pull from the crease, misses out as he plays well over the ball
another short ball and again he can not get the bat on it trying to pull
left arm spinner starts with a full toss on the leg side, plays it square, wants two and is sent back, nearly another run out
full again, this does pitch and is worked to the on side
full toss again, whipped around to the deep midwicket
tossed up on the off and that is put away on the drive past cover
pitches and turns back into the pad, no appeal
short outside off, cuts that firmly but the cover sweeper is in place and keeps it to one
full on the toes, clipped forward of square where Tshabalala cuts off
line and length, defends to the off
and again, Philander into his stride here as he brings out another defensive prod from the front foot
fuller on the off, neat looking stroke as he drives towards extra cover
just on the off, drives gently to the off, short cover this time gathers
drives again, beats short cover, Bodi at extra cover dives across to cut that off, saves two or three runs
outside off, given air, turns sharply into the pads
fullish but tossed up, stroked down the ground to a deep mid-on
well forward to cover any spin, turned with the spin to the on side
well forward, almost on the drive, turns into the inside edge and squirts away past midwicket
worked to the on side
turned off the legs from the back foot
well forward, defends
line and length, again defends, Zimbabwe have to try and bat out these overs
well forward, gets over it and defends
well forward on the off, defensive shot, gets the edge and runs away to third man
on the off, touch short, played to fine leg nudging it away with the spin
well forward gets over the pitch and smothers any turn
down the pitch, looks to clear long-on, gets the edge and a lucky run down to fine leg
looks to work that from the crease to the on side, egst the leading edge back to the bowler
worked with the turn from outside off, nudges towards the midwicket area
uses the feet, and worked well to the deep midwicket coming in quickly off the boundary
Starts off a lot better than his previous spell, length, just on the off, defended to the off
just short of a length, gets up a bit, but well over it on the front foot, defends to the off
well forward, defends the straighter ball to the off
keeps the line and length, defends to the off, can he do it for two more balls
no, gets it too short, worked to the on side
again too short, this cut behind square down to a wide thrid man
outside off, back, nudges around the corner as he turns that with the spin
well forward as he floats that up, defends down the pitch
starts that too straight, pitches and turns away down the leg side, wide called
tossed well up, does not take the bait, defends down the pitch
gets well back and works that around the corner on the leg side
just too straight and a touch short, nudges behind square on the off
line and length, defends to the off
leg side ball, worked off the pads to the on side, quick run taken wide of midwicket
back on track, defends to the off
just on the off, touch full and stroked wide of cover
on the off, angled away, gets forward and plays fairly late with the open face, runs that down to third man
floated in, back, waits and plays with the spin to the on side
better line has to get forward and cover any turn, does so well to the off
touch straight again, looks to work it to the leg, turns into the pads wide of the leg
again a better line outside off, good flight, defends to the off
seems to have found his pace now, pitched outside off, turns back into the defensive bat
drawn well forward on the front foot, looks to turn it to the on side, nudges straight to midwicket
on line and length, batsmen not taking any chances at the moment, defends to the off
just outside off, gets forward, opens the face as he plays late running it to third man
full, on line, strokes the drive towards extra cover
just short of length, width taken, full flash of the bat on the drive, beaten
fullish on the off, drives well but straight at short cover
short of length and outside off, gets back and chops to the off, loses out on runs as he plays it straight at backward point
that starts down the leg, turns further away, de Villiers has to reach a long way to get gloves to that
well flighted, this time on line, forward and stroked to the off, nearly a leading edge wide of cover
too straight again, easily worked to the leg side
flighted right up, maybe just too full and put away neatly on the drive through the cover area
no chances taken this time, defends outside off
all defensive as he flights that up on the off turning back sharply into the defensive bat
leg side ball is worked down to fine leg, van der Wath still struggling to find his line
this even further down the leg and called
over corrects with one way down the off, batsman goes after it, gets a thick edge, races away forward of third man
full, slight reverse swing, beats the bat as he tries to flick, into the pad, but going down leg, Tiffen agrees
leg stump line again, there is some reverse, flicked to fine leg
full toss on the off, attempted yorker, drives well past cover
full, the reverse swing takes it into the pad again, this time no appeal as it slants down the leg
well forward on the off, pushes to the backward point, quick run just beats the return, very close
full, too wide, drives well to the cover sweeper
flatter ball, too short, all the time in the world to pick his pot off the back foot, beats the sweeper on the off boundary
flighted up on the off, pushed from the front foot back down the pitch
too straight and worked to the on side, midwicket cuts it off
wrong line, down the leg, sweeps, no contact, and called
short outside off, back and mistimes as he forces to cover
starts with the attempted yorker, dug out down the pitch to the mid-off
all defensive as he gets on just short of length on the off
just short of length, outside off, goes over the top with the field in, couple of bounces over the boundary at cover point
fuller ball driven down the ground to mid-off
full but on the toes, clipped that wide of mid-on who has to chase it down almost to the boundary
just on the off, forward, opens the face of the bat and runs it to third man
Pollock starts leg side, Brent flicks off the pads, clips is fine and with de Villiers up to the wickets that races away for his HS in ODIs
leg stump line again, played to the midwicket
gets it back to the off, nudges it down to third man
defends to the off as Pollock gets it back on line
Brent now looking to get aggressive, has a bit of a heave ho to the on side, well covered by a diving midwicket
defends to the off
short outside off, slaps the cut at it, straight at backward point
fullish on the off, gets well forward on the drive to mid-off
Ntini stays full, Brent drives again, no runs for a good looking drive as he goes straight at cover
short from ntini, gets back and pulls that firmly, low and flat over the boundary into a cheering crowd
back to the trusted length, just short, angled into the legs, defends down the pitch
repeats the ball, repeats the shot, runs it down the pitch
now with a noisy crowd Pollock gets on line and length and is defended to the off
crowd in singing voice as Pollock stays on line and length and is played defensively to the off
full into the pads, appeal from Pollock, but that is going way down the leg
just outside off, gentle pace, worked down to third man
full leg stump line is clipped off the toes past a diving square leg with Bodi having a lot to do on the midwicket boundary
leg side once again, worked to the on side
starts on the button, defends from the front foot to the off
keeps it just full on the off, stroked into the covers
drags that down a bit outside off, punched to the cover sweeper from the back foot
full again, bit straight, drives just wide of mid-on who does get around to cut it off
line and length, defends towards cover
line and length, touch short and pushed back to Philander standing up in the crease
leg side, full, flick is missed, ball thuds into the pads
thats is pushed well down the leg side, swing and a miss, but too wide to get bat too
outside off, defends from length towards cover
just on the off, moves away off the pitch, beats the driving Chigumbura
fuller on the off, stroked square on the off for the sweeper to gather
full on the off, and that must be his worst shot of the day, had a full head in the air swish at that, beaten
just outside off, drives again and is beaten again, throws the head into the air
touch short, flat bats that down the ground to long-on
full, drives to the on side to the deep midwicket
leg stump line, in the arc, lofted well over the midwicket boundary, good hit that
fuller ball is dug out to the on side for a quick and easy run
yorker dug out of the block hole, rolls back to the bowler
defends to the off, midwicket wide enough for another easy run
just outside off, and no panic from these two, batsman runs that down to Ntini at third man
yorker fired in, just gets the bat down in time, inside edge to square leg for another easy run
short, quick, left alone
full, wide outside off, goes down on one knee and drives outside off, sadly he is beaten
does not miss this time, ball sliding down the leg, lofted one bounce over midwicket
does not miss again, this time through the covers as the over pitched ball takes him closer to his fifty
defends to the off
leg side, touch short, swings that to wide long-on for his fifty
worked off the legs towards long leg
leg side again, drives along the ground towards deep midwicket
leg side ball, flicks, misses, clips the boot, de Villiers dives to the leg, gathers, run is being taken, but a direct hit from a seated keeper who throws down the middle stump
well forward defending on the off
goes after that outside the off and is beaten
outside off, runs that to third man for his maiden fifty
leg side wide
Morkel still getting a bit of away movement off the pitch, draws the natsman forward and beats him
beaten again just outside the off, pushing forward at one leaving him off the pitch
gets well behind this one, dabs from the crease to the off, quick run taken, Duminy gathers, fires at the bowlers end, misses
just outside off, drives after making room to the leg side, beaten
leg stump line, just in the arc and pays the penalty as Maruma opens his account with a massive blast over midwicket
bowler relies with the reverse swinging yorker that thuds into the pad, appeal is upheld by Tiffen but South AFrica may be lucky with that one looking to be sliding down the leg
full again, gets the bat edge to it and squirts it down the leg side
slower ball, misses the length, Brent does not, bit of a cross bat but sends it sailing back oper the bowlers head as the 200 comes up, who would have believed that after 20 overs
drives over the cover, sweeper gets around to cut off
plays that across the line to deep midwicket, they take on Bosmans arm but TV has Mpofu short and a wicket on the last ball

inn2.comm: gets one short of a length outside off, dabs just wide of the gully, quick run taken
on the off, just short of length, gets behind it and defends down the pitch
line and length, Bosman getting well into line defends to the on side
gets a beauty, angled in, good bounce and leaves Bosman off the pitch, pushes at it from the crease, no foot movement helps the regulation edge to the keeper, great start for Zimbabwe
another left hander gets well across to the ball sliding across him, defends to the on side
Bodi gets half forward and nudges off his legs to a leg gully just behind his back
full on the legs, flicks into the ground and straight at Taylor at short midwicket, good crowd catch put down
fullish on the off, gently forward and pushing to the off
leg stump line, forward and defends to the short midwicket
on the off, gets forward, ball moves away off the seam, beats the bat but not Taibu standing up to the wicket
fullish on the off, stroked down the ground to mid-off
just short, angled across, gets back and dabs the cut to backward point
angled across, bit short, Bodi, on debut, gets back and defends to the on side
outside off, touch short but that gets up and Bodi is cutting under the ball, beaten
cuts a lot better at width with third man having a lot to do on the boundary
pushes that too far down the off side
outside off, fullish, drives straight at cover
short, Bodi is back, stands tall and punches under a diving Sibande
just short of length, on line this time and played gently from the crease to the off
touch short on the off, Smith gets back and pushes wide of mid-on as he works that from the off
stands up in the crease and pushes the short on line ball to the off
outside off, gets the leg cutter in, bounce and movement gets the ball high up on the front pad, appeal turned down
leg side, flicks, off the pad to the on side, Bodi not happy after missing out on that
line and length, gets well forward and works nudging towards the leg gully, good running from Smith
just on the off, short of length, gets forward and nudges to the leg side
outside off, good bounce from just short of length, well defended to the off
outside off, drives a bit early, squirts that to Williams at backward point
outside off, walks across to the off and with a wristy flick sends it racing away to backward square leg
defends from line and length to the off
short outside off, slashes the drive at it, hits it well but straight at cover point
full and width given, taken with both hands as he drives square of the wicket
line and length brings the big stride from Smith defending to the off
touch short, on line, defends to the on side
worked off the pads just forward of square leg, quick run has Bodi diving to get home and beat the throw
outside off, full, drives firmly into the ground to a leaping short cover who gets hands to it
short outside off, cuts firmly but low bounce has him playing well above the line
full on the legs, drives, short midwicket does well
shuffles down the pitch, gets a shortish ball, and pulls late to fine leg doing well
leg side again, clips off the feet to Brent at fine leg who again has to lift the feet to cut it off
outside off, short, left alone
slower leg side ball deceives Smith as he plays too early and takes it on the outside of the pad
short width is put away on the cut that beats the gully and backward point
fullish on the legs, stroked back towards mid-on
on line and length, Bodi gets well forward defending to his feet
outside off, cuts, but can not get to grips with the pace of the pitch, not timed to the off
well forward again, defends to the off
slower ball from Brent, mixing it up well, with little cutters, forward defending from Bodi
on line and length, Bodi playing from the crease, strokes to the off
starts a touch full on the legs, drives straight on the leg side, quick run taken to a deep mid-on
leg stump line is worked from the crease straight at the leg gully
shuffles across to the off and whips that away to the on side for long leg to clean up
line and length brings the defensive forward push from Smith
nice line being taken by the bowler is defended to the off
shuffles down the pitch and drives firmly, bowler does very well to get down and collect on the bounce
gets well set for the drive, then has to adjust for the slower ball, defends to the off
again the slower ball has Bodi in two minds, settles on the defence
slow off cutter is stroked from the front foot towards mid-off
quicker shorter ball catches him on the front foot and has to adjust standing up in the crease and defending
stroked from line and length to the off, short cover gathers
another length ball is played defensively to the short cover who this time does have to move one meter to his left
comes down the pitch, bowler now round the wicket fires it into the legs, Smith ends up defending to the off
line and length is defended down the pitch
bread and butter for Smith, full on the toes, put away through midwicket
better line, just on the off, has to defend the length to the off
leg side again, touch short, worked down to fine leg
full on the off, still not happy with the pace of the pitch as he drags that across to mid-on
line and length, taking the pace off the ball, Smith content on the forward defence
touch shorter ball, but again Smith can only defend to the on side
fullish on the off, stroked to mid-off, no run there either
fullish on the legs, clips to the on side, this time midwicket cuts off any thought of a run
no fielders there, full, on line, drives firmly back down the pitch well inside the mid-on
back into the defensive mode, runs that out to the off
discipline line continues from the Zimbabweans, strokes the length ball to mid-off
gets forward, looks to work from off to on side, not timed as it rolls away
leg stump line, not the best ball but Bodi can not take advantage as he flicks straight at short fine leg
does put this away, leg side line, and a touch short,  whips that off the legs well over the short fine leg
leg side wide, Chigumbura not happy with that last boundary
leg side bouncer, another poor ball, Bodi not interested in it
leg side, flicks well, gets high off the bat and clears the inner ring on the on side, not quite enough on it to take it to the boundary
better line and length forces the defensive push
worked off the legs into the vacant midwicket area
leg side, flicks, slow turn beats the bat into the pad, no appeal
defends a slightly flighted ball to the off
bit full, on the legs, drives well to deep wide midwicket
gets forward, worked off the pads to the short fine leg
well forward and nudges into the gap at midwicket for a quick run
fullish on the leg is driven to the deep midwicket for a walked run
full on the off, Smith stroking towards mid-off
slower ball nearly gets Bodi who is playing and then pushing at it outside the off, well beaten
slower ball again has him playing early and dabbing to the off
this time he waits on the front foot for that slower ball and nudges it with the open face towards third man
all defence as he gets a ball on line and length, maybe a little leg cutter
fullish on the leg, gets forward and drives, in the air but spilled by the bowler, maybe just a touch high at the bowlers chest, but a chance goes down
oversteps as he goes for the yorker, dug out to the off
comes down the pitch and tries to go over cover, mistimed does however just clear a retreating fielder
full on the off, forcing on drive can not beat mid-on
full on the off, forces the cover drive, but can not beat the cover field
all defensive from line and length
leg stump line, worked off the legs, fairly gently, down towards a deep square leg
starts round the wicket, too short, good fielding at deep square leg stops the pull going for four
full on the off, drives, thick edge along the ground to gully
well forward, defends to the off
outside off, drives firmly again, thick edge this time beats the gully
crowd gets very happy as he drives firmly into the covers, but it was a bump ball
full on the legs, drives to mid-on as he punches his chest, Smith coming into the game sufferuing from flu
there it is again, the bread and butter shot, on drive past midwicket as Chigumbura goes full outside leg
defends down the pitch
too full, drives straight, might have been another caught and bowled chance but that came back too fast for the bowler to get his hands close, also 50 for Smith
well forward, defends to the off

third time lucky for the bowler, gets Smith playing forward to a slower ball, Smith checks the shot too late and pushes the ball, in the air, back down the pitch for Chigumbura to hold on to a one handed catch
yorker sent down and easily dug out to the off, amazing how much time some players seem to have when playing shots
outside off, shapes to cut, ball stays low and he almost bottom edges that to the off
width outside off, full drive, inside edge beats the keeper standing up and goes away to a fine third man boundary
width again, drives again, this time he can not find the edge, rolls it to the off
Bodi struggling with this pace, mistimes the drive to the off
and again his timing lets him down, mistimes to the off
and then suddenly he gets him timing all right, a half volley outside off is effortlessly stroked down the ground
has a little look outside the off, leaves
has looked enough, gets a full ball outside off and again so much time as he times the cover drive square of the wicket
well forward and all defensive
good line and length again, well forward solid defence
slower ball, on line, touch short, worked to the on side from the crease
on the back foot to the shortish ball, watched carefully as he pushes that to the on side
shortish on the off, gets back and cuts to gully
looks for the little lap sweep, no contact, runs away off the pads
all defensive to the on side
well forward, good flight, nudges to the off
little lap sweep off length, turns into the pads
third time lucky for Bodi this time, sweeps from length but outside the leg, good contact beats Brent racing around from long leg
fullish on the legs, stroked gently towards and just wide of mid-on
well forward, nudges down the pitch
uses his feet, lofted straight to the vacant spot at long-on, good cricket shot, played under control into the spaces
good cricket from Bodi, has his boundary, so now rotates the strike with a little leg side dab
well forward, defends to the on side
gets back, nudges to the leg side
flighted up, defends to the off
once again, flighted up on the off, gets a good stride in and plays defensively under the eyes
fuller ball, stroked down the ground towards long-off
wristy little dab to the leg side
gets well forward and too the pitch, defends neutralising any turn
fullish ball, strokes the drive down the ground
fullish ball driven down to long-off
well forward, defends
well forward, changes to go on the sweep, beaten into the pads
oversteps, worked behind square
defends to the off
defends to the off
sweeps to fine leg
uses the feet outside off, pads it away
again is drawn out of the crease, gets pad and bat very close as he dabs to the off
fullish on the off, stroked down to long-off
full, flighted at the off, pushed into the ocver
well forward defending to the off
tries to go on the sweep again, only manages to trickle it to leg gully area
sweeps again without success, rolls it away to the on side
back and looks to work that fine, gets too much bat on it and rolls it to the leg gully
flighted up, very watchful as he comes out to defend
well forward all defensive
all defensive again as he gets that front foot well down the pitch
tight over so far, but gives one a touch short and time to tirn around the corner
finishes a good over with another tight line and length
on the sweep, no contact on the bat, enough on the pads though to run down to very fine third man
on the back foot and punches down the ground towards mid-on
well forward, all defensive
gets the sweep working right for him this time, only to find two players converge on it at long leg
firmly driven down the ground back at the bowler
drives again, this time to the on side but finds midwicket is up to it
sweeps again, gets the top edge but enough on it to beat the short fine leg
good flight, stroked into the gap at cover
slightly leg side, flicks away fine for an easy run as the short fine leg chases
well forward, nudges to the off, and again an easy and quick run
gets well forward defending good flight and length
flights it in but outside leg, swept well again by Bodi, seems to be getting used to the pace now, runs it firmly to long leg
quicker ball, gets forward, hurries the defence to the on side, quick run taken
well forward, nudges to the off and another good run taken
well forward, has to defend one pitching leg and turning to off
touch full and is driven down the ground to long-off
touch wide on the off but again no aggression needed, just stroked down the ground
thats a good ball, drew him out for the defensive push, bites and turns across the face of the bat, well beaten
touch full as he is driven square on the off, sweeper round to cut off
sweep eludes the diving short fine leg, gets up and chases it
uses his feet to get to the pitch, drives neatly towards long-off
another sweep and another run
well flighted, but not tempted, gets well over it and defends on the front foot
touch leg side, batsman down using his feet and then nudging very fine, great runing and maybe poor fielding
well forward and angles the bat as he nudges forward of the short fine leg
gets well forward and strokes to the off
all defensive to one turning away from the bat, runs that into the gap in the off field
not going to give him a chance to sweep, fires that in a bit quicker and is defended to the off
once again, nice length on the off, defends back down the pitch
angled into the legs, just short of length, strokes off the front foot to the on side
not timed on the drive as it squirts away to cover point
touch short on the off, gets back and looks to work that to the on side, straight at midwicket
short again, and again he can not find the gap at midwicket from the back foot
slower ball beats him as he drives to the off, manages to get enough bat to run it wide of midwicket
on the back foot and turned off the hips, in the air to a diving square leg, just falls short of the fielder, good attempt at a catch
well forward defending
on the sweep again, but not the best contact, does not beat square leg
well forward, pushes out to the cover
goes on the sweep, and thats his maiden ODI fifty on debut
well forward and defends to the off
short and wide outside off, good value for a good drive, races it past cover
full again, drives towards deep mid-off, throw comes in, poor backing up gives him a second run
well forward and playing it all on merit, defends from line and length
drives firmly straight at cover, this time no value for a good shot
gets forward and cleanly chips the bowler driving in the air and straight down the ground
too full, slower ball, on the off and now plays a majestic cover drive

around the wicket, gets forward, great length, turns away from the bat, Bodi follows, gets the edge and taibu takes, appeals all round but Bodi is already walking, no need for Tiffen to even raise a finger
well forward defending
gets off the mark working the ball from the off wide of the square leg
goes down the ground driving along the ground to long-off
gets back to a slightly short one, punches down the ground to long-off
worked off the hips to backward square leg to keep the strike
leg side, flicks, misses, clips the pad through to taibu diving, so no wide called
well forward on the leg stump, looks to flick, off the pad to square leg, quick run taken by a very fast Duminy
left hander leaves well alone as that one slides across him
gets well forward pushing gently and defensively to backward point
well forward, dabs to the off, and another lightning fast single
and again, stroked towards mid-on, Duminy is really quick
controlled lofted drive, one bounce towards long-off
well forward, defends to the off
well forward, on the defence, turn beats the bat
short ball, turns back as Duminy shapes up for an aggressive pull, misses as the ball stays slightly down, into the pad, and the finger is up
well forward defends to the off
all defensive, pushes down the wicket
full on the off, drives firmly straight at mid-off
enough width and length for a full blooded drive, has the sweeper racing across to cut off
well forward nudges to the off, no run this time, Duminy has been replaced by Pollock
on the off, gets forward defending
slower off cutter is played from the front foot but straight at midwicket
fullish on the legs, drives down the ground towards long-on
well forward, sweeps from length, top edge, loops over Taibu who has to chase
well forward, defends to the off, again had a thought of a run, changed his mind
fuller ball, drives down towards long-off
well forward, all defensive to the off
outside off, makes a bit of room to the leg side and then drives behind square on the off
fullish on the off as he strokes the drive down the ground
defensive push from line and length to the off
leg stump line and so cleanly clipped into the gap at deep midwicket, comes back for an easy two
runs this from the off down towards long-off
uses his feet and gently clips that with a few bounces towards long-on
outside off, short, cuts firmly but is beaten by the lack of bounce
well forward, down on the knee, sweeps, and gets it on the toe of the bat, rolls back down the pitch
uses his feet and drives well to extra cover, sweeper has a lot to do and can not stop the fifty
well forward, all defensive
gets down on the knee again, sweeps very fine and easily come back for the second
uses the feet again and drives down the ground
outside off, gets back and cuts late, plays to early but gets the ball off the backj of the bat to a very fine third man
up to the bat and stroked into the covers
uses the feet and drives to the on side, deep midwicket attacks the ball well and saves the second run
fullish on the off, stroked down the ground
touch short, gets on to it but not timed as it is cut off by deep square leg coming round towards midwicket
on the back foot, defends the shorter ball to the off
on the back foot again to a shorter ball, this time is doews not get up and he is lucky to get the bottom of the bat on it, also he is lucky that was not on line
touch short, cut away to the cover sweeper
short again and this is slapped away behind point
all defensive as brent takes the pace right off
fullish on the off, gets forward and the slowness of the pace gets him driving down the on side of the pitch
Pollock cuts well from short outside the off, second run is tight but Taibu drops a difficult return from the boundary
defends to the off
very wide down the leg, sweeps that wide of long leg, sets off, comes back for the second but is well short in the TV replay
well forward, drives down the ground
well forward, drives straight, but straight at the bowler
well forward, defends to the off
touch short, maybe an arm ball, worked off the hips towards backward square leg
full on the off, defends to the off, soft hands, good running
on the back foot, waits for the slower ball then whips it down to deep square leg
fullish on the off, drives with timing down to the cover sweeper
lie and length, gets forward and firmly pushed towards mid-on
fullish again, but on the legs, clipped neatly past midwicket
defends from line and length to the off
full toss outside the off is dispatched through the covers
gets well forward and plays down the line towards mid-on
all defensive on the off, short cover gathers
full toss on the off as he came down the pitch, lofts that a few bounces wide of long-off
uses his feet, down the pitch and lofted straight over the bowlers head to finish off the victory for South Africa
